readable.title: 1516714577_7d1c35a8d8
readable.content: A girl in pink twirls a ribbon . A little girl plays with a ribbon . Little girl stands in front of brick wall on cement block . The girl is wearing a white shirt with pink skirt , and she is standing in front of a house . The small girl in pigtails is wearing red socks , a red skirt and a white top .
